songs.title: Infinity
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Anytime is not ever now
So what are you waiting for?
Why wait for someone to show you how?
They may want it but you want it more

[Pre-Chorus]
No boundaries
No limits
If there's excitement, then I'm in it
If it's against the law, arrest me
If you can handle it, undress me
Gimme a record, I'll break it
Give me a chance to go and I'll take it
No beginning, no ending
On and on

[Chorus]
Don't stop me now
Don't need to catch my breath
I can go on and on
On and on
When the lights go on and there's no one left
I can go on
On and on

Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
On and On
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
On and On

[Verse 2]
They say a good thing never lasts
What goes up is gonna have to fall
But if you care too much of what people said
Then you wouldn't amount to much at all

[Pre-Chorus]
No boundaries
No limits
If there's excitement, then I'm in it
If it's against the law, arrest me
If you can handle it, undress me
Gimme a record, I'll break it
Give me a chance to go and I'll take it
No beginning, no ending
On and on

[Chorus]
Don't stop me now
Don't need to catch my breath
I can go on and on
On and on
When the lights go down
And there's no one left
I can go on
On and on

Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
On and On
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
Infinity
On and On

[Outro]
Infinity
